title: OgNasty
author: OgNasty
content: Just over 15 minutes until takeoff. A historic moment for mankind on our quest to become a multi-planetary species. If you are able, check it out!https://www.spacex.com/launches/mission/?missionId=starship-flight-test

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Scrubbed the launch… I thought Elon was joking when he said he had a feeling it would be delayed until 4/20. I guess not.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on April 17, 2023, 01:32:17 PMScrubbed the launch… I thought Elon was joking when he said he had a feeling it would be delayed until 4/20. I guess not. It can be quite amusing how a billionaire can be that much into memes. At this point, It would not surprise me if in three days the rocket appeared to be painted with the Dogecoin logo, to make the launch even more news-worthy. I do not follow much the progress done by Spacex as company, so I would have guessed they had already launcher vessels into space before, but according to what I just read on internet, I would be wrong. Let us see how it goes.

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: That launch would have been historic and it will be very historic when it launches.Musk and SpaceX have revolutionised the industry by being able to reuse the rockets multiple times and the same will be the case for Starship, a super heavy rocket and the factits reusable makes launching this massive rocket feasable.

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: I never thought that they can actually postpone the launch after putting it live on the internet. Anyway, there must be some kind of a problem and they really need to make sure to be 100% when they launch this starship because its mission is the most important of all when it comes to making Mars a livable planet. I'm just glad that I'm witnessing such events in my time and really appreciate these people's work of doing this despite their difficult situations when it comes to making possible the impossible.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: I wonder if Musk is secretly putting one of these together out in orbit - https://newatlas.com/orion-project-atom-bomb-spaceship/49454/.

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on April 17, 2023, 01:32:17 PMScrubbed the launch… I thought Elon was joking when he said he had a feeling it would be delayed until 4/20. I guess not. Everything must be in good condition before the take-off. This project cost a whole lot of money and the reputation of Elon Musk and his firm is at stake. It is better to delay the flight than to fail in this project. The reusability of the rocket is a unique feature that will help to reduce cost and promote mastery for the crew members. I just hope the launch will not be delayed and it will not be out of place to watch this great event. Quote from: Hispo on April 17, 2023, 04:43:21 PMIt can be quite amusing how a billionaire can be that much into memes. At this point, It would not surprise me if in three days the rocket appeared to be painted with the Dogecoin logo, to make the launch even more news-worthy. Elon Musk's crypto career is dead because he has not always kept his promise concerning his involvement in cryptocurrencies. He will only attract newbies or gullible investors to his Dogecoin promotion if he ever does that.

comments.author: crypt0m4nia
comments.body: Quote from: yazher on April 17, 2023, 06:41:27 PMI never thought that they can actually postpone the launch after putting it live on the internet.One of the main reasons why people disregard the 69' moon landing as a Kubrick-directed hoax...

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on April 17, 2023, 01:32:17 PMScrubbed the launch… I thought Elon was joking when he said he had a feeling it would be delayed until 4/20. I guess not. You know, Elon has a habit of placing dirty jokes Easter eggs in business affairs.

comments.author: Similificator
comments.body: I got kinda disappointed thinking I was too late and would only have to watch a recording but then when I checked, it says it's still about to go live in about 47 hours. Which should have given me a sigh of relief but oddly enough, I got disappointed again that it still hasn't launched yet haha. I'm excited though, since I really am a fan of his work and dedication when it comes to this field. Can't say the same thing on other things he does though. I guess it's good that along with his genius he still has a sense of humor at least? xD

comments.author: coolcoinz
comments.body: Not the first and not the last delayed Spacex flight. I think I watched one a couple months ago where they've already placed astronauts in there, started counting, fueling the engines and shut it down because of not having enough fuel or too much fuel I don't remember. I love that he resurrected the mostly dead US space program. Rocket launches was what we used to all watch in the 80s and 90s and then it stopped, mostly due to the shuttle program being discontinued.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: I’m just bummed to learn they’re going to splash down in the ocean instead of being caught by the tower. That would have been amazing to see. I understand they don’t want to damage the tower though. I can’t wait until they start testing that. It is going to be an amazing sight to see. For now though I’m excited to see Starship take off as a complete ship.

comments.author: arielbit
comments.body: What if space is fake and man did not ever left earth? LOL it would be an epic shitstorm LOL

comments.author: coolcoinz
comments.body: Quote from: arielbit on April 20, 2023, 05:25:36 PMWhat if space is fake and man did not ever left earth? LOL it would be an epic shitstorm LOLAnd Earth is held by Atlas.Do you believe in flat earth and that the moon landing was fake because they wanted to win the race against Russia? The Russian MIR was never in orbit, there were no space shuttles, the ISS is really transmitting from Earth and we never landed any robots on Mars. Also, Musk's car was never launched into space and he carries the Internet to Ukraine via couriers because Starlink is not in orbit, as there's no orbit... We could go on and on.

comments.author: arielbit
comments.body: Quote from: coolcoinz on April 20, 2023, 07:12:52 PMQuote from: arielbit on April 20, 2023, 05:25:36 PMWhat if space is fake and man did not ever left earth? LOL it would be an epic shitstorm LOLAnd Earth is held by Atlas.Do you believe in flat earth and that the moon landing was fake because they wanted to win the race against Russia? The Russian MIR was never in orbit, there were no space shuttles, the ISS is really transmitting from Earth and we never landed any robots on Mars. Also, Musk's car was never launched into space and he carries the Internet to Ukraine via couriers because Starlink is not in orbit, as there's no orbit... We could go on and on. Satellites are held by ballons, hence called sattelloons LOL, there are no real pic of earth from space--all CGI and photoshop.Race with Russia? Nope., the rabbit hole runs very deeeeep LOLOLOL.

comments.author: arielbit
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on April 19, 2023, 06:07:56 AMI’m just bummed to learn they’re going to splash down in the ocean instead of being caught by the tower. That would have been amazing to see. I understand they don’t want to damage the tower though. I can’t wait until they start testing that. It is going to be an amazing sight to see. For now though I’m excited to see Starship take off as a complete ship. What if the ocean is the real destiny of rockets and bermuda triangle's purpose was to hide them? LOL

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: Quote from: Hispo on April 17, 2023, 04:43:21 PMQuote from: OgNasty on April 17, 2023, 01:32:17 PMScrubbed the launch… I thought Elon was joking when he said he had a feeling it would be delayed until 4/20. I guess not. At this point, It would not surprise me if in three days the rocket appeared to be painted with the Dogecoin logo, to make the launch even more news-worthy. Lol... you know that makes sense for a pump on Dogecoin right... An idea most of these new, clueless and coin mobs would buy with the starship rocketing into space. Maybe we would have some alienated dogecoin meme next,  Well, the quest for the multiplanetion of the human race has taken a huge step marked with the flight, am still cool with planet earth. Having all my needs shiped to me and in a place where I can barely control nothing or getting back to earth would be such a planned event by a crew other than mine would be so controlling. Nice one Texas SpaceX on this milestone of archivement, in and out.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Quote from: Smartvirus on April 21, 2023, 07:02:40 AMQuote from: Hispo on April 17, 2023, 04:43:21 PMQuote from: OgNasty on April 17, 2023, 01:32:17 PMScrubbed the launch… I thought Elon was joking when he said he had a feeling it would be delayed until 4/20. I guess not. At this point, It would not surprise me if in three days the rocket appeared to be painted with the Dogecoin logo, to make the launch even more news-worthy. Lol... you know that makes sense for a pump on Dogecoin right... An idea most of these new, clueless and coin mobs would buy with the starship rocketing into space. Maybe we would have some alienated dogecoin meme next,  Well, the quest for the multiplanetion of the human race has taken a huge step marked with the flight, am still cool with planet earth. Having all my needs shiped to me and in a place where I can barely control nothing or getting back to earth would be such a planned event by a crew other than mine would be so controlling. Nice one Texas SpaceX on this milestone of archivement, in and out.It was a missed opportunity to catch the attention of dogecoiners and further pump the market. But even doing that is too much for Elon Musk, specially with the amount of negative attention some people can give to him on Twitter and in the establishment media.Also, the point if the space exploration is to have further access to resources and shelter the humanity in other planets, in the case of a global event which could lead to humanity to struggle with climate or other kind of threats. You can love Earth, but it is just matter of time before Amazon also does shipments to Mars and beyond.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Elon has become too much of a joke lately and has caused a lot of reactions on social media, the billionaire whale has dominated the space and has not given any breathing space, which has resulted in the removal of bags from verified Twitter to changing the bird logo to dogecoin.Aby the way the entire Elon Musk thing has become a more centralized space where the billionaire exacts his will at any point and can influence the audience.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Quote from: Hispo on April 21, 2023, 08:56:27 PMIt was a missed opportunity to catch the attention of dogecoiners and further pump the market. But even doing that is too much for Elon Musk, specially with the amount of negative attention some people can give to him on Twitter and in the establishment media.and beyond.  He should've convinced a bunch of whales to send their dogecoin hardware wallets to space with the Starship just for shits and giggles.
